name: NSView.AutoresizingMask
desc: Constants used by the autoresizingMask property.

items.name: static var minXMargin: NSView.AutoresizingMask
items.desc: The left margin between the view and its superview is flexible.

items.name: static var maxXMargin: NSView.AutoresizingMask
items.desc: The right margin between the view and its superview is flexible.

items.name: static var minYMargin: NSView.AutoresizingMask
items.desc: The bottom margin between the view and its superview is flexible.

items.name: static var maxYMargin: NSView.AutoresizingMask
items.desc: The top margin between the view and its superview is flexible.
